info.title: Restau TyTy API
info.description: API documentation for Restaurant Management System

post.description: Registers a new user and returns a token
Logs in a user and returns a token
Creates a new order. If guest, returns a session token.

get.description: For guests, requires X-Order-Token header matching the order.

parameters.name: X-Order-Token
parameters.description: Guest Session Token (required if not authenticated)

get.description: Returns list of restaurants with owner

post.description: Creates a new restaurant and assigns owner

message.example: Restaurant mis à jour avec succès

delete.description: Deletes a record and returns no content
